Header.title: The DOM Playground
Header.subtitle: Drag and drop HTML tags to the left into the dropzone to the right.

DOMPreview.title: The DOM
DOMPreview.description: The {format} code generated from the tags you have dropped.
DOMPreview.aiPromptPlaceholder: Describe the DOM structure you want to generate...
DOMPreview.emptyState: You haven't dropped any tags yet!

Dropzone.emptyState: Click and drag one of the tags to the left and drop it here to start building
Dropzone.dropError: The tag <{dragTag}/> cannot be placed inside a <{containerTag}/> tag as one of its direct children

TagSelector.title: HTML Tags
TagSelector.description: Hover over a tag to see its description. You can also drag and drop tags into the dropzone to the right.
